txt.en: 'The halflings are curious creatures. How they can so easily spend their time with party and play when the darkness looms, I know not. But perhaps we can all learn from them.\n\n'I wish to help them with their festival, so I will allow you to fish off our docks and bring them the fruits of your labour.'
'I do not think it is wise to tarry long, mellon; your time is short enough as it is.'

The hobbits celebrating the Lithe Festival need many fish for their pond. The Elves have granted you permission to catch some off the port of Celondim.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends.</rgb>
Catch as many fish as you can in twenty minutes

The docks are at Celondim in Ered Luin, far to the west of Bree and the Shire.\n\nThe docks of Celondim have long been a popular site for Elven Fishermen. They have allowed you some time to catch fish for the hobbits' Lithe Festival.
